content: I have Mathlib imported in my Lean4 project, and have also included import Mathlib.Tactic.FieldSimp, but I'm still getting unknown identifier 'field_simp'. Can someone help me see what I am missing?

#mwe please

That sound like a suspicious erorr message though as I think it means you're not in tactic mode?
Problem solved. I was in tactic mode, but was trying to use it in an incorrect way. Creating the #mwe made me realize this, so thank you for helping me get there
Dominique Danco has marked this topic as resolved.
